imdb.plot outline: In Allotment Life, this documentary show follows garden rescue guru and allotment plot holder Earth-Angel Ric as he goes about his daily life. A man of Nature and straight to the point gardening enthusiast that he is, this six-part series follows the Earth-Angel as he helps six individuals reach their healthy living goals through the natural resources that owning an allotment can bring. Enjoying the chillies of Devon, alternative living in Wales and Yoga camps in Essex - we follow Ric and his Allotment Life students on a journey that ends with a project to bring natural foods to a hard-up school in Essex.
imdb.title: EarthAngels Allotment Life
plot: In Allotment Life, this documentary show follows garden rescue guru and allotment plot holder Earth-Angel Ric as he goes about his daily life. A man of Nature and straight to the point gardening enthusiast that he is, this six-part series follows the Earth-Angel as he helps six individuals reach their healthy living goals through the natural resources that owning an allotment can bring. Enjoying the chillies of Devon, alternative living in Wales and Yoga camps in Essex - we follow Ric and his Allotment Life students on a journey that ends with a project to bring natural foods to a hard-up school in Essex.::Eddie Bammeke
